body: Hello, not to long ago I started live streaming on Twitch, there should be a rank that atleast tells others that you are a broadcaster and also would be cool if you could click on the broadcasters name in game and it would bring you to the stream or something like that. I just think it would be cool and a fun and easy way to grow your channel and your server capabilities! Please reply and tell me what you all think, thank you!
body_tagged: Hello, not to long ago I started live streaming on Twitch, there should be a rank that atleast tells others that you are a broadcaster and also would be cool if you could click on the broadcasters name in game and it would bring you to the stream or something like that. I just think it would be cool and a fun and easy way to grow your channel and your server capabilities! Please reply and tell me what you all think, thank you!
title: Twitch Livestreamer Rank

replies.body:
This is practically the same as the VIP rank, which is 5000 subscribers, and the YouTuber rank, which is 50,000 subscribers.

To have a Twitch rank, there should probably be some type of requirement as well.
replies.body_tagged:
This is practically the same as the VIP rank, which is 5000 subscribers, and the YouTuber rank, which is 50,000 subscribers.

To have a Twitch rank, there should probably be some type of requirement as well.
